name: FaceBook !!! Windows 7 login !!! FaceBook
description:
This is a fast little script that changes your default Facebook login with Windows 7 ones!
Originally created for GChrome,but compiled for MFirefox also!
Created by: dDesign (ex webstyle!)
Hope you like it!
For more themes see my profile! link: http://userstyles.org/users/129127
